name: Dinosaur Safari: I-Evolution
description:
​Dinosaur Safari: Evolution has high quality graphics and gameplay.

Jurassic dino adventures don’t come any bigger than what you’re about to experience.

A world full of deadly carnivores hunt you while you hunt them:

TRex, Spinosaurus, Velociraptors, Stegosaurus, Raptors, Euoplocephalus Triceratops, Pterodactyl, Dilophosaurus, Parasaurolophus, Brontosaurus, Gigantic Worm, Plesiosaur, Compsognathus, Allosaurus, Dunkleosteus, Sarcosuchus, Achelousaurus, Deinonychus, Nodosaur, Medusaceratops, Giganotosaurus, Torosaurus, Edmontonia and Pentaceratops.

Lucky for you, when walking and running about gets too scary, use your 4x4 off-road vehicle, Motorbike or Horse to encounter a true Jurassic Safari.

Use a vast amount of weapons to hunt by day and build a camp fire at night to keep those dangerous dino’s in sight.
